verses.verse: It happened the same year, <S%H8141><s%> in the beginning <S%H7225><s%> of the reign <S%H4467><s%> of Zedekiah <S%H6667><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> in the fourth <S%H7243><s%> year, <S%H8141><s%> in the fifth <S%H2549><s%> month, <S%H2320><s%> that Hananiah <S%H2608><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Azzur, <S%H5809><s%> the prophet, <S%H5030><s%> who was of Gibeon, <S%H1391><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> to me in the house <S%H1004><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> in the presence <S%H5869><s%> of the priests <S%H3548><s%> and of all the people, <S%H5971><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Within two full <S%H3117><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> will I bring again <S%H7725><s%> into this place <S%H4725><s%> all the vessels <S%H3627><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s house, <S%H1004><s%> that Nebuchadnezzar <S%H5019><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%> took away <S%H3947><s%> from this place, <S%H4725><s%> and carried <S%H935><s%> to Babylon: <S%H894><s%>

and I will bring again <S%H7725><s%> to this place <S%H4725><s%> Jeconiah <S%H3204><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jehoiakim, <S%H3079><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> with all the captives <S%H1546><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> who went <S%H935><s%> to Babylon, <S%H894><s%> says <S%H5002><s%> Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%> for I will break <S%H7665><s%> the yoke <S%H5923><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon. <S%H894><s%>

even the prophet <S%H5030><s%> Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Amen: <S%H543><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> so; <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh perform <S%H6965><s%> your words <S%H1697><s%> which you have prophesied, <S%H5012><s%> to bring again <S%H7725><s%> the vessels <S%H3627><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s house, <S%H1004><s%> and all them of the captivity, <S%H1473><s%> from Babylon <S%H894><s%> to this place. <S%H4725><s%>
Nevertheless hear <S%H8085><s%> you now this word <S%H1697><s%> that I speak <S%H1696><s%> in your ears, <S%H241><s%> and in the ears <S%H241><s%> of all the people: <S%H5971><s%>

The prophets <S%H5030><s%> who have been before <S%H6440><s%> me and before <S%H6440><s%> you of old <S%H5769><s%> prophesied <S%H5012><s%> against many <S%H7227><s%> countries, <S%H776><s%> and against great <S%H1419><s%> kingdoms, <S%H4467><s%> of war, <S%H4421><s%> and of evil, <S%H7451><s%> and of pestilence. <S%H1698><s%>

Then Hananiah <S%H2608><s%> the prophet <S%H5030><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> the bar <S%H4133><s%> from off the prophet <S%H5030><s%> Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%>'s neck, <S%H6677><s%> and broke it. <S%H7665><s%>

Hananiah <S%H2608><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> in the presence <S%H5869><s%> of all the people, <S%H5971><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Thus says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh: <S%H3068><s%> Even so will I break <S%H7665><s%> the yoke <S%H5923><s%> of Nebuchadnezzar <S%H5019><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%> within two full <S%H3117><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> from off the neck <S%H6677><s%> of all the nations. <S%H1471><s%> The prophet <S%H5030><s%> Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> his way. <S%H1870><s%>

Then the word <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> came to Jeremiah, <S%H3414><s%> after <S%H310><s%> that Hananiah <S%H2608><s%> the prophet <S%H5030><s%> had broken <S%H7665><s%> the bar <S%H4133><s%> from off the neck <S%H6677><s%> of the prophet <S%H5030><s%> Jeremiah, <S%H3414><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

For thus says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies, <S%H6635><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%> I have put <S%H5414><s%> a yoke <S%H5923><s%> of iron <S%H1270><s%> on the neck <S%H6677><s%> of all these nations, <S%H1471><s%> that they may serve <S%H5647><s%> Nebuchadnezzar <S%H5019><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon; <S%H894><s%> and they shall serve <S%H5647><s%> him: <S%H5414><s%> and I have given him the animals <S%H2416><s%> of the field also. <S%H7704><s%>

Then the prophet <S%H5030><s%> Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Hananiah <S%H2608><s%> the prophet, <S%H5030><s%> Hear <S%H8085><s%> now, <S%H2608><s%> Hananiah: Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has not sent <S%H7971><s%> you; <S%H5971><s%> but you make this people to trust <S%H982><s%> in a lie. <S%H8267><s%>

Therefore thus says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> Behold, <S%H7971><s%> I will send you away from off the surface <S%H6440><s%> of the earth: <S%H127><s%> this year <S%H8141><s%> you shall die, <S%H4191><s%> because you have spoken <S%H1696><s%> rebellion <S%H5627><s%> against Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>
So Hananiah <S%H2608><s%> the prophet <S%H5030><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> the same year <S%H8141><s%> in the seventh <S%H7637><s%> month. <S%H2320><s%>
